title: Soul Eaters
description: "Curses aren't real. They are a silly made up superstition given to us to help explain things that aren't rational." Vicki's world is turned upside down in a matter of days. Now she's running for her life. Forced to save herself and her two small children from things that used to be just a myth. Just when she thinks she's finally found a way to protect them, she's asked to risk that all for the sake of the world. Is she strong enough to defy the odds and save the world? Or will she stand by and let evil take over?
author: R.L. Ankney
